title: Red Sox have reportedly ‘drawn back’ pursuit of Twins pitcher Joe Ryan
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Joe Ryan would have been an elite starter to pair with Garrett Crochet moving forward.
Joe Ryan was one of Boston's top targets in July.
Matt Krohn/Getty Images The Red Sox reportedly made a late push at July’s MLB trade deadline to try and land Twins ace Joe Ryan at the buzzer.

title: 3 dead after double murder-suicide in Springfield
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime Prosecutors identified the two victims and the man who allegedly fatally stabbed them before killing himself.
The three people found dead in a Springfield home last month after a double murder-suicide have been identified, prosecutors announced Monday.
Springfield police responded to the 1400 block of State Street the morning of Nov.

title: Report: Red Sox might meet face-to-face with Pete Alonso at Winter Meetings
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Pete Alonso has averaged 42 home runs and 114 RBI over his seven-year career.
Pete Alonso is one of the top free agents available this winter.

AP Photo/Adam Hunger By Conor Ryan December 8, 2025 | 5:25 PM 2 minutes to read A Red Sox team in desperate need of more pop at the plate could be setting themselves up for an in-person meeting with one of the top sluggers on the free-agent market this week.

title: Mass. town declares emergency amid ongoing ‘dirty water’ crisis
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News Brown water has been delivered to some Bridgewater homes for weeks.
The state Department of Environmental Protection declared a water supply emergency in Bridgewater on Saturday.
Some residents of Bridgewater have faced an ongoing “dirty water” crisis for weeks as brown water has come out of faucets and filled tubs and toilets, according to NBC10 Boston.

title: 3 charged in connection with Providence College student overdoses
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime Seven Providence College students overdosed at an off-campus party Friday, sparking a police investigation.

Steven Senne / AP, File By Abby Patkin December 8, 2025 | 3:38 PM 2 minutes to read Three people are facing drug and firearm charges after seven Providence College students overdosed at an off-campus party late Friday night.

title: Bruins injury updates: Charlie McAvoy, David Pastrnak both expected to play on road trip
